entities.name: malfoy boy
entities.description: The Malfoy boy had vanished, he must have slipped past, up the stairs to the Tower.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville ran at it and got thrown up into the air

entities.name: ron
entities.description: None of us could break through, said Ron

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: a massive Death Eater was still firing off jinxes all over the place

entities.name: snape
entities.description: And then Snape was there, and then he wasn’t –

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: I saw him running towards us, but that huge Death Eater’s jinx just missed me right afterw ards and I ducked and lost track of things,

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: I saw him run straight through the cursed barrier as though it wasn’t there

relationships.description: And then Snape was there, and then he wasn’t –
I saw him run straight through the cursed barrier as though it wasn’t there
